name: Earth-616 (Main Continuity)
description: The primary Marvel Universe. All mainline continuity from Fantastic Four #1 (1961) to present takes place here. Briefly destroyed and rebuilt during Secret Wars (2015).

name: Ultimate Universe
description: A modernized reimagining of the Marvel Universe launched with Ultimate Spider-Man (2000). Featured grounded, contemporary takes on classic characters. Destroyed during Secret Wars (2015), but Miles Morales and the Maker survived into Earth-616. Revived by the Maker in Ultimate Invasion (2023).

name: Marvel 2099
description: A cyberpunk future set in the year 2099. Features future legacy heroes: Spider-Man 2099 (Miguel O'Hara), Doom 2099, Punisher 2099, X-Men 2099. Originally launched in 1992, revived multiple times. Spider-Man 2099 has crossed into 616 continuity.

name: Marvel Zombies
description: An alternate universe where a zombie virus infected Earth's superheroes. Originated in Ultimate Fantastic Four #21-23 before getting its own series. Marvel Zombies by Robert Kirkman became a surprise hit. The zombie heroes consume Galactus and gain cosmic power.

name: Spider-Gwen / Earth-65
description: A universe where Gwen Stacy was bitten by the radioactive spider instead of Peter Parker. Peter becomes the Lizard and dies. Gwen operates as Spider-Woman (Ghost-Spider). Debuted in Edge of Spider-Verse #2 (2014) and became a breakout hit.

name: Marvel Cinematic Universe
description: The film/TV universe beginning with Iron Man (2008). While separate from comics continuity, the MCU has heavily influenced comic storylines, character designs, and editorial direction since its inception.

name: Marvel's Spider-Man (Video Game)
description: The Insomniac Games Spider-Man universe. Features an experienced Peter Parker and later Miles Morales. Received its own comic tie-ins. Marvel's Spider-Man 2 (2023) expanded the universe with Venom and Kraven.

name: MC2 / Spider-Girl Universe
description: A future timeline where the next generation of heroes takes over. May 'Mayday' Parker becomes Spider-Girl, the daughter of Peter and Mary Jane. The longest-running female-led Marvel solo series at the time. Created by Tom DeFalco.

name: Squadron Supreme Universe
description: Home of the Squadron Supreme, Marvel's Justice League analogues. Featured in the landmark Squadron Supreme limited series (1985) by Mark Gruenwald â€” one of the first deconstructions of the superhero genre, predating Watchmen.

name: Age of Apocalypse
description: A timeline where Legion killed Xavier before the X-Men were founded. Apocalypse conquered North America. Magneto leads the X-Men. Created during the 1995 AoA event, this reality has been revisited multiple times and characters like X-Man (Nate Grey), Dark Beast, and Sugar Man crossed into 616.

name: Larval Universe (Spider-Ham)
description: An anthropomorphic animal universe featuring Peter Porker, the Spectacular Spider-Ham. Originally a humor title, Spider-Ham gained mainstream popularity through Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018).

name: Marvel Noir
description: A 1930s pulp-inspired universe. Spider-Man Noir, X-Men Noir, Iron Man Noir reimagine Marvel characters in a Depression-era setting. Spider-Man Noir became a fan favorite through the Spider-Verse films and received a live-action series on Amazon.
